description:
Provides an ALIKAFKA sasl acl resource.

-> **NOTE:** Available in 1.66.0+

-> **NOTE:**  Only the following regions support create alikafka sasl user.
[`cn-hangzhou`,`cn-beijing`,`cn-shenzhen`,`cn-shanghai`,`cn-qingdao`,`cn-hongkong`,`cn-huhehaote`,`cn-zhangjiakou`,`ap-southeast-1`,`ap-south-1`,`ap-southeast-5`]

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AclOperationType.description: Operation type for this acl. The operation type can only be "Write" and "Read".

AclResourceName.description: Resource name for this acl. The resource name should be a topic or consumer group name.

AclResourcePatternType.description: Resource pattern type for this acl. The resource pattern support two types "LITERAL" and "PREFIXED". "LITERAL": A literal name defines the full name of a resource. The special wildcard character "*" can be used to represent a resource with any name. "PREFIXED": A prefixed name defines a prefix for a resource.

AclResourceType.description: Resource type for this acl. The resource type can only be "Topic" and "Group".

InstanceId.description: ID of the ALIKAFKA Instance that owns the groups.

Username.description: Username for the sasl user. The length should between 1 to 64 characters. The user should be an existed sasl user.
